fields.name: Classic
fields.description: The Classic is a reliable sidearm that's accurate when stationary. Its alternate fire bursts three bullets when moving.

fields.name: Shorty
fields.description: A short-range shotgun pistol that's deadly at close range but ineffective beyond a few meters.

fields.name: Frenzy
fields.description: A fully automatic pistol that's deadly in close quarters but has high recoil.

fields.name: Ghost
fields.description: A precise pistol with a silencer and good accuracy. Headshots deal significant damage.

fields.name: Sheriff
fields.description: A high-impact revolver that can kill with one headshot at any range.

fields.name: Stinger
fields.description: A rapid-fire SMG that's deadly at close range but has high recoil and damage falloff.

fields.name: Spectre
fields.description: A silenced SMG with good accuracy and damage at medium range.

fields.name: Bucky
fields.description: A shotgun with two firing modes: close-range spread and medium-range focused shot.

fields.name: Judge
fields.description: An automatic shotgun that's deadly in close quarters but ineffective at range.

fields.name: Bulldog
fields.description: A burst-fire rifle that's accurate and powerful when used correctly.

fields.name: Guardian
fields.description: A semi-automatic rifle with high accuracy and penetration power.

fields.name: Phantom
fields.description: A fully automatic rifle with a silencer and high accuracy. Better at close-medium range than the Vandal.

fields.name: Vandal
fields.description: A fully automatic rifle that maintains high damage at long range. Headshots kill instantly at any distance.

fields.name: Marshal
fields.description: A lever-action sniper rifle that's deadly when scoring headshots.

fields.name: Outlaw
fields.description: A double-barreled, break-action rifle, the Outlaw has two different reload options depending on whether the player needs to reload bullets into one or both of its barrels..

fields.name: Operator
fields.description: A bolt-action sniper rifle that can kill with one shot to the body at most ranges.

fields.name: Ares
fields.description: A heavy machine gun that increases fire rate the longer it's fired.

fields.name: Odin
fields.description: A high-powered machine gun that can penetrate walls and increases fire rate over time.

fields.name: Melee
fields.description: A standard knife that deals high damage in melee range. Has an alternate fire for quick slashes.

fields.title: Bind
fields.content: Bind is a two-site map with teleporters that allow quick rotation between sites. It features a unique mechanic with one-way teleporters that can be used for quick rotations. The map has no middle area, forcing teams to choose between attacking A or B site directly. The teleporters create interesting gameplay opportunities for both attackers and defenders.

fields.title: Haven
fields.content: Haven is unique among Valorant maps as it features three bomb sites (A, B, and C) instead of the usual two. This creates more opportunities for attackers but also requires defenders to spread their resources more carefully. The map has a central area that connects all three sites, making rotations important for both teams.

fields.title: Split
fields.content: Split is a map with a strong vertical element, featuring many elevation changes and ropes that allow quick movement between levels. The middle area is crucial for controlling rotations between sites. The map's design favors defensive play with many tight angles and chokepoints that defenders can hold.

fields.title: Ascent
fields.content: Ascent is set in Venice, Italy and features mechanical doors that can be opened or closed to alter pathways. The map has an open middle area that's important for controlling rotations. The two bomb sites offer different approaches, with Site A being more open and Site B having more cover and angles.

fields.title: Icebox
fields.content: Icebox is set on a frozen shipping facility and features ziplines, lots of vertical gameplay, and multiple levels. The map has many tight angles and requires good coordination to attack or defend effectively. The two sites are very different, with Site A being more vertical and Site B being more horizontal.

fields.title: Breeze
fields.content: Breeze is set on a tropical island and features wide-open spaces and long sightlines. The map encourages long-range engagements and has unique features like mechanical doors and a one-way chute. The large size of the map makes rotations take longer, requiring good timing and coordination.

fields.title: Fracture
fields.content: Fracture has a unique H-shaped layout with spawn points in the middle and sites on either side. Attackers can choose to push from multiple directions, including behind the defenders' spawn. The map features ziplines and many different pathways, creating complex decision-making for both teams.

fields.title: Pearl
fields.content: Pearl is set underwater in an Omega Earth version of Lisbon, Portugal. The map features no special mechanics like doors or teleporters, focusing instead on traditional tactical gameplay. The map has three main lanes with a mix of tight corridors and open areas, requiring balanced team compositions.

fields.title: Lotus
fields.content: Lotus is set in India and features three sites, rotating doors, and a destructible wall. The map introduces new mechanics including a rotating door that can change pathways and a destructible wall that can create new sightlines. The three-site layout requires defenders to spread their resources carefully.

fields.title: Sunset
fields.content: Sunset is set in Los Angeles and features a traditional two-site layout with a focus on mid-control. The map has a mix of tight angles and open spaces, requiring teams to adapt their strategies. The aesthetic is inspired by the vibrant culture of LA's Koreatown neighborhood.

fields.title: Abyss
fields.content: Abyss is the first map in VALORANT to have no outer boundaries and a death drop in Mid, making it possible in these areas for players to fall off the map to their death. Some parts of the map can only be accessed by jumping across these drops; the Danger and Secret positions are narrow ledges on the map's outer boundaries that are used as jump shortcuts. In Mid, players can also only get up to Catwalk directly from Top or Library by making a jump over Mid's death drop to an ascender.

fields.title: Brimstone
fields.content: Brimstone is a tactical agent who specializes in area control and providing utility for his team. His abilities focus on creating zones of control and providing vision for his allies. Brimstone's signature ability, Sky Smoke, allows him to call in a series of smoke grenades that obscure vision in a large area. His ultimate ability, Orbital Strike, calls in a powerful laser strike that deals significant damage over time in a targeted area. Brimstone's Stim Beacon provides a damage boost to allies within its radius, making it ideal for coordinated pushes. His Incendiary grenade creates a field of fire that damages enemies over time. Brimstone's tactical prowess makes him a valuable asset in any team composition.

fields.title: Viper
fields.content: Viper is an agent who specializes in controlling areas with her poisonous abilities. Her kit focuses on creating zones of control that restrict enemy movement and visibility. Viper's signature ability, Poison Cloud, throws a gas emitter that creates a cloud of poison, damaging enemies who pass through it. Her ultimate ability, Viper's Pit, creates a large field of poison that obscures vision and damages enemies within it. Viper's Snake Bite fires a projectile that creates a pool of poison, damaging and slowing enemies caught in it. Her Toxic Screen creates a line of poison gas emitters that form a wall, restricting enemy movement and vision. Viper's control over the battlefield makes her a formidable opponent in any situation.

fields.title: Omen
fields.content: Omen is an agent who specializes in manipulating shadows and creating opportunities for his team. His abilities focus on disrupting enemy positions and providing utility for his allies. Omen's signature ability, Shrouded Step, allows him to teleport a short distance, making him unpredictable and hard to pin down. His ultimate ability, From the Shadows, allows him to teleport anywhere on the map, providing valuable information and creating opportunities for his team. Omen's Paranoia ability sends out a shadowy projectile that nearsights enemies who look at it, making them easier targets. His Dark Cover ability creates a shadowy sphere that obscures vision, making it perfect for escapes or tactical maneuvers. Omen's ability to manipulate shadows and create opportunities makes him a valuable asset in any team composition.

fields.title: Killjoy
fields.content: Killjoy is an agent who specializes in defending areas with her ingenious traps and devices. Her abilities focus on controlling the battlefield and providing utility for her team. Killjoy's signature ability, Alarmbot, places a bot that hunts down enemies who come within its range, applying a debuff that makes them vulnerable. Her ultimate ability, Lockdown, creates a device that detains all enemies caught in its radius, preventing them from using abilities or moving. Killjoy's Turret deploys a turret that fires at enemies within its line of sight, dealing damage over time. Her Nanoswarm grenade creates a field of nanobots that damage enemies within it. Killjoy's defensive capabilities make her an invaluable asset in any team composition.

fields.title: Cypher
fields.content: Cypher is an agent who excels in gathering information and controlling the battlefield with his technological abilities. His kit focuses on revealing enemy positions and creating traps to catch unsuspecting foes. Cypher's signature ability, Trapwire, places a tripwire that reveals and dazes enemies who trigger it. His ultimate ability, Neural Theft, reveals the location of all living enemies within a large radius. Cypher's Cyber Cage creates a zone that slows and reveals enemies who pass through it. His Spycam allows him to place a remote camera that can tag enemies, providing valuable information for his team. Cypher's ability to gather intelligence and control the battlefield makes him a valuable asset in any team composition.

fields.title: Sova
fields.content: Sova is an agent who excels in reconnaissance and providing information for his team. His abilities focus on revealing enemy positions and creating opportunities for his allies. Sova's signature ability, Recon Bolt, fires an arrow that reveals the location of enemies caught in its area. His ultimate ability, Hunter's Fury, fires three powerful energy blasts that deal significant damage and reveal enemies hit by them. Sova's Owl Drone allows him to pilot a drone that can tag enemies, providing valuable information for his team. His Shock Bolt fires an arrow that emits a damaging pulse, dealing damage to enemies caught in its radius. Sova's reconnaissance capabilities make him an invaluable asset in any team composition.

fields.title: Sage
fields.content: Sage is a support agent who excels in healing and reviving her allies. Her abilities are crucial for maintaining team health and providing defensive utility. Sage's signature ability, Healing Orb, restores the health of an ally or herself over time. Her ultimate ability, Resurrection, allows her to revive a fallen teammate, bringing them back into the fight with full health. Sage's Barrier Orb creates a solid wall that can block enemy fire and movement, providing cover for her team. Her Slow Orb slows enemies caught in its area, making them easier targets. Sage's supportive capabilities make her an essential part of any team composition.

fields.title: Phoenix
fields.content: Phoenix is an agent who embodies the power of fire and rebirth. His abilities focus on dealing damage over time and providing self-healing. Phoenix's signature ability, Hot Hands, throws a fireball that creates a zone of fire, damaging enemies who pass through it. His ultimate ability, Run It Back, marks his current location and, if he dies during its duration, he will be resurrected at the marked spot with full health. Phoenix's aggressive playstyle and self-sustain make him a valuable asset in pushing objectives and securing kills.

fields.title: Jett
fields.content: Jett is an agent known for her incredible speed and agility. Her abilities allow her to dash through the battlefield, evade enemy fire, and reposition herself quickly. Jett's signature ability, Cloudburst, creates a cloud of smoke that obscures vision, making it perfect for escapes or tactical maneuvers. Her ultimate ability, Blade Storm, equips her with a set of highly accurate throwing knives that deal significant damage and can be thrown in quick succession or all at once for a powerful burst. Jett's mobility and precision make her a formidable opponent in any situation.

fields.title: Reyna
fields.content: Reyna is an agent who thrives on eliminating enemies and gaining strength from her kills. Her abilities focus on self-sustain and increasing her combat effectiveness. Reyna's signature ability, Devour, consumes the soul of a nearby enemy corpse, healing her and providing a temporary health boost. Her ultimate ability, Empress, increases her firing speed, equip speed, and reload speed, and provides a temporary health boost. Reyna's Leer throws an ethereal eye that nearsights enemies who look at it, making them easier targets. Her Dismiss ability allows her to consume a soul orb, becoming intangible for a short duration. Reyna's aggressive playstyle and self-sustain make her a formidable opponent in any situation.

fields.title: Raze
fields.content: Raze is an agent who excels in dealing high damage and creating chaos on the battlefield. Her abilities focus on explosive power and area denial. Raze's signature ability, Boom Bot, sends out a robot that hunts down enemies and explodes on contact, dealing damage. Her ultimate ability, Showstopper, equips her with a powerful rocket launcher that deals massive damage in a large area. Raze's Blast Pack allows her to throw a satchel charge that propels her into the air, providing mobility and outplay potential. Her Paint Shells ability throws a cluster grenade that deals damage and scatters bomblets on impact. Raze's explosive capabilities make her a formidable opponent in any situation.

fields.title: Breach
fields.content: Breach is an agent who specializes in disrupting enemy positions and creating opportunities for his team. His abilities focus on controlling the battlefield and providing utility for his allies. Breach's signature ability, Fault Line, creates a seismic blast that dazes and knocks up enemies caught in its path. His ultimate ability, Rolling Thunder, sends a cascade of quakes through walls, stunning and damaging enemies caught in its area. Breach's Flashpoint charges create a flash that blinds enemies who look at it, making them easier targets. His Aftershock ability sends a slow-acting burst through a wall, dealing damage to enemies on the other side. Breach's ability to disrupt enemy positions makes him a valuable asset in any team composition.

fields.title: Skye
fields.content: Skye is an agent who excels in scouting and providing support for her team. Her abilities focus on revealing enemy positions and healing her allies. Skye's signature ability, Trailblazer, sends out a Tasmanian tiger that can be controlled to scout ahead and tag enemies. Her ultimate ability, Seekers, sends out a pack of seekers that track down and reveal enemies caught in their path. Skye's Regrowth ability heals herself and nearby allies over time, providing sustain in combat. Her Guiding Light ability sends out a hawk that can be controlled to scout ahead and blind enemies. Skye's scouting and support capabilities make her an invaluable asset in any team composition.

fields.title: Yoru
fields.content: Yoru is an agent who specializes in deception and creating opportunities for his team. His abilities focus on creating distractions and outmaneuvering his enemies. Yoru's signature ability, Fakeout, sends out a decoy that mimics footsteps, creating audio cues to confuse enemies. His ultimate ability, Dimensional Drift, allows him to become invisible and invulnerable, providing valuable information and creating opportunities for his team. Yoru's Blindside ability sends out an energy orb that blinds enemies who look at it, making them easier targets. His Gatecrash ability allows him to place a teleport beacon that he can return to at any time, providing mobility and outplay potential. Yoru's deceptive playstyle and ability to create opportunities make him a valuable asset in any team composition.

fields.title: Astra
fields.content: Astra is an agent who excels in controlling the battlefield with her cosmic abilities. Her abilities focus on creating zones of control and providing utility for her team. Astra's signature ability, Gravity Well, creates a singularity that pulls in and damages enemies caught in its area. Her ultimate ability, Cosmic Divide, creates a massive wall that blocks vision and sound, providing cover for her team. Astra's Nova Pulse ability sends out a concussive blast that dazes enemies caught in its radius. Her Nebula ability creates a smoke cloud that obscures vision, making it perfect for escapes or tactical maneuvers. Astra's cosmic control over the battlefield makes her a formidable opponent in any situation.

fields.title: KAY/O
fields.content: KAY/O is an agent who excels in disrupting enemy abilities and creating opportunities for his team. His abilities focus on nullifying enemy abilities and providing utility for his allies. KAY/O's signature ability, Zero/Point, throws a suppression blade that disables enemy abilities caught in its area. His ultimate ability, NULL/CMD, sends out a pulse that suppresses enemy abilities in a large radius. KAY/O's Flash/Drive ability sends out a flash grenade that blinds enemies who look at it, making them easier targets. His FRAG/ment ability throws a fragmentation grenade that deals damage and suppresses enemies caught in its radius. KAY/O's ability to disrupt enemy abilities and create opportunities makes him a valuable asset in any team composition.

fields.title: Chamber
fields.content: Well-dressed and well-armed, French weapons designer Chamber expels aggressors with deadly precision. He leverages his custom arsenal to hold the line and pick off enemies from afar, with a contingency built for every plan.

fields.title: Neon
fields.content: Filipino Agent Neon surges forward at shocking speeds, discharging bursts of bioelectric radiance as fast as her body generates it. She races ahead to catch enemies off guard, then strikes them down quicker than lightning.

fields.title: Fade
fields.content: Turkish bounty hunter, Fade, unleashes the power of raw nightmares to seize enemy secrets. Attuned with terror itself, she hunts targets and reveals their deepest fears—before crushing them in the dark.

fields.title: Harbor
fields.content: Born from the fury of the Indian Ocean, Harbor brings forth waves of power to shield his team and overpower his enemies. He commands water as his greatest weapon, summoning tides to soak the battlefield in chaos and control.

fields.title: Gekko
fields.content: Gekko the Angeleno leads a tight-knit crew of calamitous creatures. His buddies bound forward, scattering enemies out of the way, with Gekko chasing them down to regroup and go again.

fields.title: Deadlock
fields.content: Norwegian operative Deadlock deploys an array of cutting-edge nanowire to secure the battlefield from even the most lethal assault. No one escapes her vigilant watch, nor survives her unyielding ferocity.

fields.title: Iso
fields.content: Chinese fixer for hire, Iso falls into a flow state to dismantle the opposition. Reconfiguring ambient energy into bulletproof protection, he advances with focus towards his next duel to the death.

fields.title: Clove
fields.content: Scottish troublemaker Clove makes mischief for enemies in both the heat of combat and the cold of death. The young immortal keeps foes guessing, even from beyond the grave, their return to the living only ever a moment away.

fields.title: Vyse
fields.content: Metallic mastermind Vyse unleashes liquid metal to isolate, trap, and disarm her enemies. Through cunning and manipulation, she forces all who oppose her to fear the battlefield itself.

fields.title: Tejo
fields.content: A veteran intelligence consultant from Colombia, Tejo's ballistic guidance system pressures the enemy to relinquish their ground - or their lives. His targeted strikes keep opponents off balance and under his heel.

fields.title: Waylay
fields.content: Thailand's prismatic radiant Waylay transforms into light itself as she darts across the battlefield, striking down her targets through shards of light before flitting back to safety, all in the blink of an eye.
